title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.221 - Scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.221 - Scope

State Regulations
(a) Sections
255.225 through
255.245
of this Part prescribe
minimum requirements for welding steel materials in pipelines. (b) These sections do not apply to welding
that occurs during the manufacture of steel pipe or steel pipeline
components. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
255.221

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
